implier.details:
Implier
Type: Jove Frigate
Base Build Time: 2h
Required Skill: Advanced Shipbuilding II

Materials:
- Tritanium: 45000
- Pyerite: 8000
- Mexallon: 3500
- Isogen: 800
- Nocxium: 200
- Zydrine: 90
- Megacyte: 45
- Jove Propulsion Matrix: 10
- Jove Tactical Array: 10
- Auto-Integrity Preservation Seal: 35
- Life Support Backup Unit: 18

Jove ships require special materials that are rare and difficult to obtain.
